products.title: Hive Silkweave Hills Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Made to measure hive silkweave hills cream perfect fit pleated blind, px78002.

products.title: Hive Blackout Iron Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout iron perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Infusion Asc Saffron Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc saffron perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.
